data.trans: Là do, gán cho, quy cho
data.trans_hint: Có thể nói thành công của ông ấy phần lớn là do làm việc chăm chỉ.
data.en_hint: His success can be attributed largely to hard work.
data.content_game_1: His success can be attributed largely to hard work.
data.answer_en_hint: His success can be attributed largely to hard work.

data.trans_hint: Quy kết rằng sự thăng chức của cô ấy chỉ nhờ vào may mắn thì không công bằng.
data.en_hint: Attribution of her promotion solely to luck is not fair.
data.content_game_1: attribution of her promotion solely to luck is not fair.
data.answer_en_hint: attribution of her promotion solely to luck is not fair.

data.trans_hint: Vị giám đốc đã gửi một lời cảm ơn đặc biệt tới các nhân viên vì sự cống hiến và nhiệt tình của họ.
data.en_hint: The director gave a special thanks to staffs for their dedication and enthusiasm.
data.content_game_1: The director gave a special thanks to staffs for their dedication and enthusiasm.
data.answer_en_hint: The director gave a special thanks to staffs for their dedication and enthusiasm.

data.trans_hint: Ông được tặng một chiếc đồng hồ vàng nhằm ghi nhận cho thời gian làm thư ký câu lạc bộ.
data.en_hint: He was presented with a gold watch in recognition of his years as club secretary.
data.content_game_1: He was presented with a gold watch in recognition of his years as club secretary.
data.answer_en_hint: He was presented with a gold watch in recognition of his years as club secretary.

data.trans_hint: Công nghệ đang tiến bộ với tốc độ nhanh chóng.
data.en_hint: Technology is advancing at a rapid pace.
data.content_game_1: Technology is advancing at a rapid pace.
data.answer_en_hint: Technology is advancing at a rapid pace.

data.trans_hint: Tôi rất trân trọng Susan vì sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy đối với công việc quan trọng này.
data.en_hint: I respect Susan a lot thanks for her assistance with this crucial work.
data.content_game_1: I respect Susan a lot thanks for her assistance with this crucial work.
data.answer_en_hint: I respect Susan a lot thanks for her assistance with this crucial work.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy gần đây đã được bầu chọn trở thành chủ tịch của STI.
data.en_hint: She was recently elected as STI president.
data.content_game_1: She was recently elected as STI president.
data.answer_en_hint: She was recently elected as STI president.

data.trans_hint: Ủy ban bầu cử thấy rằng không có ứng cử viên nào nhận được đủ số phiếu để trở thành người chiến thắng.
data.en_hint: The election commission found that neither candidate received enough votes to be a winner.
data.content_game_1: The election commission found that neither candidate received enough votes to be a winner.
data.answer_en_hint: The election commission found that neither candidate received enough votes to be a winner.

data.trans_hint: Một vài công ty sử dụng tiền thưởng như là một sự khích lệ đối với nhân viên để họ làm việc chăm chỉ hơn.
data.en_hint: Some companies use bonuses as an encouragement to their staff to work harder.
data.content_game_1: Some companies use bonuses as an encouragement to their staff to work harder.
data.answer_en_hint: Some companies use bonuses as an encouragement to their staff to work harder.

data.trans: Trung thành, chung thủy, trung thực
data.trans_hint: Cô đã được khen thưởng vì trung thành với công ty trong hơn 40 năm.
data.en_hint: She was rewarded for being faithful with the company for over 40 years.
data.content_game_1: She was rewarded for being faithful with the company for over 40 years.
data.answer_en_hint: She was rewarded for being faithful with the company for over 40 years.

data.trans_hint: Khu vực này đang được quảng bá là một điểm đến du lịch.
data.en_hint: The area is being promoted as a tourist destination.
data.content_game_1: The area is being promoted as a tourist destination.
data.answer_en_hint: The area is being promoted as a tourist destination.

data.trans_hint: Ông ấy đã hết lời khen ngợi các nhà cung cấp và công nhân, vì đây là chiếc xe tiên tiến nhất về mặt kỹ thuật từng được chế tạo tại Thái Lan.
data.en_hint: He paid a big compliment to the suppliers and worker, since this is the most technically advanced car ever built in Thailand.
data.content_game_1: He paid a big compliment to the suppliers and worker, since this is the most technically advanced car ever built in Thailand.
data.answer_en_hint: He paid a big compliment to the suppliers and worker, since this is the most technically advanced car ever built in Thailand.
